sentence.Network_en: Enlil demands punishment for Marduk and Nabu; Enki opposes, but his son Nergal sides with Enlil.
sentence.Network_cn: 伊利尔要求惩罚马杜克和拿布; 伊其反对, 但他的儿子尼格尔却站在伊利尔那一边.

sentence.Network_en: Originally Enki made seven men and seven women, but the numbers of mankind soon multiplied.
sentence.Network_cn: 恩奇最初造了七个男人和七个女人, 但是人类的数目很快又繁殖了.

sentence.Network_en: Drawing lots, Enlil wins command of Earth Mission; Enki is relegated to Africa.
sentence.Network_cn: 出了很多份额, 伊利尔赢得了地球任务的指挥权; 伊奇是归属于非洲.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 安广(enki)的转帖列表，汇集了安广(enki)分享的最新转帖内容。加入开心网，与好友分享最新最热的图片，视频，心情，评论和各种 …

means.word_mean: 1. water god and god of wisdom; counterpart of the Akkadian Ea
